Found the key, seemingly hidden in bed.

But new, worse problem. At about 73% thru Part 1 module of the Prophet Module:

CRASH.

In the dream, find a cabin in woods, with people dead. Then find a Guy that help kill a werewolf in Black Wolf form.

Then when you tell him that his family is murdered, go back to cabin, you find his family alive.

When you try to convince the guy that he caught lycanthropy, and that he is going to murder his own family because of that, your given 2 choices.

1. You can either fight, kill him.

2. You can leave, and the guy murders his family.

No matter what I do, when I walk out the door, after that, it CRASHES, quits the mod, NWN game.

When I reload it to try either the same thing an or different thing, the thing crashes again and again each time.

There is just no way to avoid the crash, bug, etc.

I havent noticed anybody else having this problem, so its probably a EE problem.

And since I am on mobile device, there is no debug mode, and there is only uninstalling, deleting the Mod files and then re downloading, and re installing the Mod files.

And its NOT a Hak, or TLK, etc, in the wrong place, because if it was, I usually get a notice, error warning about that, when, if that's the case.

Only thing I can think to do, since I am pretty close to the end of Part 1, I can find, read a walkthru, readme, to get the rest of the story of Part 1, then import the character into part 2.

Character might be underleveled by 2,3,4,5 levels, and might miss out on the experience, treasure, gold, items, cutscenes, story, etc.

But then again started character at 6th level solo, when it recommends 8,9,10th levels for solo, and did just fine.

So should probably be fine underleveled in part 2.

I really hope I can either find a way to fix crash or import into and continue playing in part 2, as the module is pretty awesome.

It would be a shame if didnt get chance to play the rest of the mod

But Oh Well.

So I imported into Prophet part 2, and even tho underleveled I killed a giant crab, then killed 33 to 67 Asabi Lizardmen, then:

Problem cant enter Gothra's Lair to get from the cliffs to the Desert.

The entrance is thru, underneath, under, etc, a giant stone easter island like statue, head, that has its mouth open.

Your supposed to walk thru that opening in the mouth, and follow a very extremely short path to the Doorway entrance.

The problem is Baldecaran's selection of Problematic tiles he used to build the module, make it so that in certain areas like the Elvej City, Shatterpeak Mountains, Gothra's Lair Entrance, etc, that sometimes cant step mini tile A to mini tile B, even tho click it.

Thie makes it so that even if, tho you have a unobstructed, direct path to the doorway, and you click on either the doorway, or a point very close to the doorway, that your character wont walk to the doorway, nor enter, go thru the doorway, because of that.

After a clicking a Zillion diferent mini tiles, areas, etc, a zillion times, it was impossible to walk to the doorway, an or go thru the doorway.

The end result was character STUCK, not able to goto thru the entrance, doorway, that was semi close by, in direct sight, view, big, ominous looking.

And if dont go thru that entrance, which seems impossible to do, then cant progress, advance, go any further in story, mod, etc.

So because of that. Have to quit, at least temporarily, and find a way to level up to about 13th to 18th level, then skip the rest of part 2, and go import into part 3.

Maybe its EE enhanced edition, but these bugs, glitches, crashes, problems, etc, is making what is otherwise is, should be a great Mod, UNPLAYABLE.

I dont know how the Mod voted best in Hall of Fame, with all these problems, unless previous versions of NWN worked with Mod, and its EE, not the Mod.

Sad such awesome potential with this Mod.
